doc:
Carlena Beard https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carlena_Beard 0 Carlena Beard (March 19, 1929 – February 23, 1972) was an American child actress, most famous for portraying several different minor characters in the Our Gang short films from 1930 to 1935. She was a native of Los Angeles, California. Her older brother was Matthew "Stymie" Beard, one of the series' most popular and best-remembered characters.Carlena Beard was African-American. Carlena_Beard ( March_19_,_1929 – February_23_,_1972 ) was an_American_child_actress , most_famous for portraying several_different_minor_characters in the_Our_Gang_short_films from 1930 to 1935 . She was a_native of Los_Angeles , California . Her_older_brother was Matthew_"_Stymie_"_Beard , one of the_series_'_most_popular_and_best-remembered_characters.Carlena_Beard was African-American .
